Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 6 Saṃkiliṭṭhattika » 6.7 Pañhāvāra » 6.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Saṃkiliṭṭhattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
36.
2930Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta, naāsevane satta, nakamme satta, navipāke satta, naāhāre satta, naindriye satta, najhāne satta, namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
<< 6.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīyaup Ghaṭanā >>
